title: Learning Analytics-Integrated Classroom Observation Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental instructional design and learning analytics concepts, with experience in mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies for in-service math teachers and practitioners by integrating learning analytics and classroom observation.

learning_goals: Educational insights can be derived by linking learning analytics data with classroom observation records
Observation tools optimized for math instruction can be developed through participatory design
Observation frameworks can be shared with peer teachers using focus group interview techniques

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Device Support Guide

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
